content:
Hi, I would like to try to create a component with async fn.
I know It's a p3 feature.
But since the release of rc, how to build a component without the wasm32-wasip3 target (not yet release)?
I have to wait his release?

@Joel Dice has a good example up here: https://github.com/dicej/hello-wasip3-http/blob/main/Makefile

hello-wasip3-http/Makefile at main · dicej/hello-wasip3-http
Contribute to dicej/hello-wasip3-http development by creating an account on GitHub.
You'll need a custom Wasmtime build off of the man branch with the components feature enabled. Or wait until next Monday's Wasmtime release which will include that.

Awesome, thanks!
Will start with my component today, and Monday update Wasmtime to try to run it
Sounds good! Let us know how it goes!
